<rules> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Greater than"> <source>Ticks</source> <value id="1">600</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Ticks</target> <value>0</value> </action> </actions> </rule> <rule> <conditions> <condition test="Less than"> <source>Ticks</source> <value id="1">0</value> </condition> </conditions> <actions> <action type="property"> <target>Ticks</target> <value>600</value> </action> </actions> </rule> </rules>
